p: For a research article to be included in the review it had to meet the following criteria: (i) focused on an African country; (ii) provide original quantitative serological information on RVFV in humans, livestock and/or wildlife; and (iii) be available in the English language. Studies were excluded if: they had utilised previously published seroprevalence datasets for further analysis (including mathematical modelling), or they had not recorded the year of sampling ( Fig 1).
